title: Is the story of Emily Rose true? Was she really troubled by 13 ghosts or was she a mentally disturbed girl? - Quora

response.answer_text: i suppose ,no .This story is actually based upon exorcism of a 19 year old girl named Annilese Michel .she had epilepsy as because she was a religious person from catholic family . Actually her own body made her belief that she was demonically possessed . It was proved in prosecution case.Her body was also exhumated or dug up to see if the claims made by the priest were right .She had died because of malnutrition due to the recklessness of her parents ,herself and the priest.She believed than not eating would force the spirits to leave
